title: The Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Act, 1985 (Act no. 61 of 1985)
subjects: Drugs of abuse -- Law and legislation -- India -- Criminal provisions

notes.value: "Together with the Prevention of Illicit Traffic in Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Act, 1988 (Act no. 46 of 1988), Narcotic Drugs and Pyschotropic Substances Rules, 1985, Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances (execution of bond by convicts or addicts) Rules, 1985, the Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Consultative Committee Rules, 1988 with notifications."
